name: Endpoint Health
headline: Precision-first therapies
description: Endpoint Health is on a mission to address urgent needs in immune-driven critical and chronic illnesses by delivering therapies that are personalized to each patient’s biology. We built Endpoint Health from the ground up to develop and commercialize therapeutics and therapy-guiding tests, to ensure that every patient receives personalized treatment that will dramatically improve their outcomes. Our vision is a world in which all patients have effective, personalized treatment, because therapies are targeted to the right patient at the right time.

founders.name: Diego Rey, Founder/CSO
founders.description: Diego Rey, born in Bariloche, Argentina and now based in San Francisco, holds a BS (UCSB) in electrical engineering and PhD (Cornell) in biomedical engineering minoring in applied engineering physics and biophysics. He co-founded GeneWEAVE (acquired by Roche) and Endpoint Health (W19) developing rapid bacterial detection and immune disease therapeutics. Diego was the first bio Visiting Partner at YC. He Angel invests and serves on Cornell advisory councils.

#### Privacy Overview
This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the ...
Necessary 
Necessary
Always Enabled
Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website. They are most commonly set in response to actions by you that result in a request for services, like setting your privacy settings, logging in, or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but this will result in certain parts of the website not working. These cookies do not store any personal information.Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics| 11 months| These cookies may be placed on our site by our advertising partners. Those companies may use these cookies to create a profile of your interests and show you advertisements on other sites based on your interests. They do not store personal information directly, but they are generated by specifically identifying your browser and internet device. You may disable or reject these cookies, and as a result, you will experience less targeted advertising.  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional| 11 months| The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional".  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary| 11 months| Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website. They are most commonly set in response to actions by you that result in a request for services, like setting your privacy settings, logging in, or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but this will result in certain parts of the website not working. These cookies do not store any personal information.  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-non-necessary| 1 year| Set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin, this cookie is used to record the user consent for the cookies in the "Non-necessary" category .  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-others| 11 months| This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other.  
cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance| 11 months| These cookies enable us to see traffic sources and count visits to evaluate and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which parts are most and least popular and to track how visitors navigate our site. We may provide these cookies to third-party service providers to help us understand and analyze the data collected (e.g. Google Analytics). The information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore it is not specific to you personally. If you disable or reject these cookies, we will not know when you have visited our site and our ability to monitor the site’s performance will be more limited.  
viewed_cookie_policy| 11 months| The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.  
Performance 
Performance
These cookies enable us to see traffic sources and count visits to evaluate and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which parts are most and least popular and to track how visitors navigate our site. We may provide these cookies to third-party service providers to help us understand and analyze the data collected (e.g. Google Analytics). The information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore it is not specific to you personally. If you disable or reject these cookies, we will not know when you have visited our site and our ability to monitor the site’s performance will be more limited.Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
_ga| 2 years| The _ga cookie, installed by Google Analytics, calculates visitor, session and campaign data and also keeps track of site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognize unique visitors.  
_gat_gtag_UA_155758063_1| 1 minute| Set by Google to distinguish users.  
_gid| 1 day| Installed by Google Analytics, _gid cookie stores information on how visitors use a website, while also creating an analytics report of the website's performance. Some of the data that are collected include the number of visitors, their source, and the pages they visit anonymously.  
AnalyticsSyncHistory| 1 month| No description  
li_gc| 2 years| No description  
Targeting 
Targeting
These cookies may be placed on our site by our advertising partners. Those companies may use these cookies to create a profile of your interests and show you advertisements on other sites based on your interests. They do not store personal information directly, but they are generated by specifically identifying your browser and internet device. You may disable or reject these cookies, and as a result, you will experience less targeted advertising.Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
bcookie| 2 years| LinkedIn sets this cookie from LinkedIn share buttons and ad tags to recognize browser ID.  
bscookie| 2 years| LinkedIn sets this cookie to store performed actions on the website.  
lang| session| LinkedIn sets this cookie to remember a user's language setting.  
lidc| 1 day| LinkedIn sets the lidc cookie to facilitate data center selection.  
UserMatchHistory| 1 month| LinkedIn sets this cookie for LinkedIn Ads ID syncing.  
Functional 
Functional
Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features.These cookies allow our website to give you a more functional and personalized experience. They may be set by us or third-party service providers whose services we have incorporated into our pages. If you disable or reject these cookies, then these services may not function properly.Cookie| Duration| Description  
---|---|---  
__cf_bm| 30 minutes| This cookie, set by Cloudflare, is used to support Cloudflare Bot Management.

generated_description:
**Endpoint Health: Innovating Precision Medicine**

Founded in 2018 and based in Palo Alto, Endpoint Health has set out on an ambitious mission: to create precision-first therapies that address critical and chronic immune-driven illnesses. With a team of 23 and backing from Y Combinator's Batch W19, they are pioneering a new approach in the biopharma industry.

At the core of Endpoint Health’s vision is the belief that every patient deserves personalized treatment. Their mantra, "patient-first," flips the traditional molecule-first drug development model on its head. Instead of creating drugs and then trying to fit them to patients, they aim to tailor treatments based on each patient’s unique biology. This targeted approach has the potential to dramatically improve patient outcomes.

Endpoint Health is actively developing therapies and therapy-guiding tests, all designed to ensure effective treatment reaches the right patient at the right time. Their focus on precision immunology reflects an understanding of the complexity of human biology and the personal nature of immune-mediated diseases. They're also building a robust clinical and data ecosystem to support this precision approach.

If you're interested in exploring more about their innovative strategies, or to see how they might fit into the broader landscape of biopharma, check out their [website](https://endpointhealth.com/) where they detail their approach, pipeline, and ongoing partnerships. 

In summary, Endpoint Health is not just another biopharmaceutical company; it's a new kind of biopharma that redefines how therapeutic treatments are developed and administered, all with a singular goal in mind: to revolutionize patient care.
